meanings.sent1: The cushats flew gracefully across the sky.

meanings.definition: Cushats (verb): to nestle or snuggle closely
meanings.sent1: The siblings cushats together on the couch while watching a movie.
meanings.sent2: I love to cushats with my cat on lazy Sunday afternoons.

meanings.sent4: She cushats her favorite teddy bear tightly when she feels scared.
